IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO HELP SALEM STATE UNIVERSITY MEET ITS NEEDS AND GOALS BY RAISING AND MANAGING CONTRIBUTIONS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO HELP SALEM STATE UNIVERSITY MEET ITS NEEDS AND GOALS BY RAISING AND MANAGING CONTRIBUTIONS.
IRS990.Desc: GRANTS AND ALLOCATIONS MADE TO STUDENTS OF SALEM STATE UNIVERSITY AND DEPARTMENTS WITHIN SALEM STATE UNIVERSITY WHICH IS IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE FOUNDATION'S EXEMPT PURPOSE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE INTENDED USE OF THE ENDOWMENT FUNDS IS TO SUPPORT THE PROGRAMS OF THE FOUNDATION.

SALEM STATE UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION, INC. IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND THEREFORE HAS MADE NO PROVISION FOR FEDERAL INCOME TAXES IN THE ACCOMPANYING FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES GENERALLY ACCEPTED IN THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA REQUIRE AN ENTITY TO ASSESS THE PROBABILITY THAT A TAX POSITION HAS A MORE LIKELY THAN NOT (MLTN) SUSTAINABILITY AFTER REVIEW BY TAX AUTHORITIES. IF A TAX POSITION IS DEEMED NOT TO MEET THIS THRESHOLD, ANY UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS AND COSTS ARE ESTIMATED AND RECOGNIZED. TAX RETURNS ARE ROUTINELY OPEN FOR REVIEW BY THE TAX AUTHORITIES FOR THREE YEARS FROM THEIR DUE DATE. IN CERTAIN CIRCUMSTANCES THE STATUTE OF LIMITATIONS MAY REMAIN OPEN INDEFINITELY.
PROVISION FOR LOSSES ON PLEDGE RECEIVABLES 2,000,000. .

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: SUPPORT THE UNIVERSITY AND ITS MISSION

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GRANTS AND CONTRIBUTIONS ARE MONITORED IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE TERMS OF THE AGREEMENTS.

THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR IS EMPLOYED BY THE COMMONWEALTH OF MASSACHUSETTS AT SALEM STATE UNIVERSITY AS ITS VICE PRESIDENT OF INSTITUIONAL ADVANCEMENT. ACCORDINGLY, THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR'S COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED BY SALEM STATE UNIVERSITY IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE LAWS OF THE COMMONWEALTH OF MASSACHUSETTS.
GIFTS ARE RECORDED AT THE FAIR MARKET VALUE OF THE GIFT, ON THE DATE OF DONATION. THE ORGANIZATION USES EASTERN BANK TO RECEIVE AND SELL ANY DONATED PUBLICLY TRADED SECURITIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DIRECTORS DAVID D. SURFACE AND DEBRA LEE SURFACE HAVE A FAMILY RELATIONSHIP.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION PROVIDED A COPY OF THE FORM 990 BY EMAIL TO THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, PRESIDENT, TREASURER, AND THE FULL BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR REVIEW PRIOR TO FILING THE RETURN.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION REQUESTS ANNUAL UPDATES OF ANY CONFLICTS OF INTERESTS AND REVIEWS THE INFORMATION FOR EACH INDIVIDUAL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SALEM STATE UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION UPON REQUEST FROM THE PUBLIC AUTHORITY, FAXES THE INFORMATION REQUESTED TO THE APPROPRIATE AUTHORITY.
PROVISION FOR LOSSES ON PLEDGE RECEIVABLES -2,000,000.

THE FOUNDATION HAS AN AUDIT COMMITTEE WHOSE PURPOSE IS THE OVERSIGHT AND REVIEW OF THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND SELECTION OF AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT. THIS PROCESS HAS NOT BEEN CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
